review: I have been consulting her for over 4 years now. *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** ** ********** She gives enough time to discuss your problem *** ***** ***** *********** *********** Amazing doctor, very friendly and always has smile on her face.
Doctor is very patient. Gives enough time to explain the problem you are facing. Makes you comfortable & explains what needs to be done & why. Good experience. Thank you Maam.
